reqs:
Pre-reqs: FNH 250 and one of BIOL 201, BIOC 202.
This is a Wait List Section for FNH 350 Section 001. Students will be moved according to their priority on the waitlist if space becomes available. All queries should be directed to the Faculty of Land and Food Systems Student Services at students@landfood.ubc.ca.
description: Fundamentals of energy and macronutrient metabolism.
